experience.description: during the course of service with ajioz limitted the Gomerce project (multivendor ecommerce) was built as a team. I participated as a team lead for the backend and also as backend engineer developing the API using Flask (BluePrint, RestFul API, SQLAlchemy, PostgresSQL).

The contract with YeagerAI was the development of yeager ai web application (which is an AI that builds AI using Web-Sockets, Celery, Slippers, Redis, FastAPI, Dj-Channels). During the development of the application, i was charged with the responsibility of handling websockets, dj-channel operations, celery for async task, Fask API data consumption, and other task

The contract with Mami was the development of a multivendor web application. During the development of mami hub, i was recruited as a backend engineer and have utilized the Node TypeScript Framework for the development of some designated task by the team lead.
